explanation: [0-0] The video begins with an outdoor scene, where a boy in a red school uniform is standing by a table. Another girl, also in a red school uniform, is standing behind him looking at her phone.

[0-3] The boy bends down and jumps up, landing on the bottom of a girl sitting at the table, then stands up and gestures forward. The scene then switches to an indoor scene, where the same girl is sitting alone on a bench, holding her knees with her head down, seemingly heartbroken.
